name: sbbibvv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)), wal(s1, wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)), wal(s1, wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w1))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)), wal(s1, wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w1))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wb(wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)), wal(s1, wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w1))))
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

|- wb(wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)), wal(s1, wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
